creditline: The John Skogmo and Tom Morin Endowment for Art Acquisition and gift of funds from Kaywin Feldman and Jim Lutz, Jennifer Komar Olivarez and Enrique Olivarez, Jr., and Eike Schmidt and Roberta Bartoli in memory of John Skogmo
description: decanter with two vessels which rest one on top of the other and stopper; bottom vessel of clear glass with rounded bottom with slightly concave foot; straight, wide neck with spout; smaller top vessel is green glass with straight cylindrical bottom section with flat foot with small concave area at center bottom; rounded top portion with tall slightly tapering neck and wide flat mouth ring; stopper has large rounded small surmounting a smaller ball; speckled and swirled clear, black, yellow-orange and turquoise glass
marks:
Signature, Inscription and Date

see Signed on bottom of a (clear vessel), incised: [K. Franck
title: Kremlin Bells double decanter
